content: You are an AI reasoner that always follows the specified format.

[[axiom:(tumpus 'x) -> (jompus 'x)]]. 9- [[prop:yumpus]] are [[prop:happy]]. [[axiom:(yompus 'x) -> (happy 'x)]]. 10- [[prop:zumpus]] are [[prop:vumpus]]. [[axiom:(zumpus 'x) -> (vumpus 'x)]]. 11- [[prop:vumpus]] are [[prop:impus]]. [[axiom:(vumpus 'x) -> (impus 'x)]]. 12- [[prop:impus]] are [[prop:numpus]]. [[axiom:(impus 'x) -> (numpus 'x)]]. 13- Each [[prop:rompus]] is a [[prop:yumpus]]. [[axiom:(rompus 'x) -> (yumpus 'x)]]. 14- [[prop:rompus]] are [[prop:luminous]]. [[axiom:(rompus 'x) -> (luminous 'x)]]. 15- [[prop:yumpus]] are [[prop:zumpus]]. [[axiom:(yumpus 'x) -> (zumpus 'x)]]. 16- [[prop:jompus]] are [[prop:rompus]]. [[axiom:(jompus 'x) -> (rompus 'x)]]. 17- [[prop:wumpus]] are [[prop:tumpus]]. [[axiom:(wumpus 'x) -> (tumpus 'x)]]. 18- [[object:wren]] is a [[prop:rompus]]. [[axiom:(rompus wren)]].
Formalized goal: [[goal:(not (cold wren))]]
Reasoning: [[infer:(yumpus wren)]] Wren is a yumpus. [[infer:(zumpus wren)]] Wren is a zumpus. [[infer:(vumpus wren)]] Wren is a vumpus. [[infer:(impus wren)]] Wren is an impus. [[infer:(not (cold wren))]] Wren is not cold. This was the goal.
Answer: True

Context: 1- Vumpuses are zumpuses. 2- Each zumpus is a rompus. 3- Every tumpus is small. 4- Each impus is a tumpus. 5- Each rompus is a jompus. 6- Tumpuses are wumpuses. 7- Every yumpus is transparent. 8- Yumpuses are numpuses. 9- Zumpuses are orange. 10- Jompuses are yumpuses. 11- Rompuses are floral. 12- Wumpuses are vumpuses. 13- Every wumpus is nervous. 14- Every impus is temperate. 15- Jompuses are not sweet. 16- Dumpuses are not floral. 17- Every vumpus is angry. 18- Sally is a tumpus.

[[axiom:(jompus 'x) -> (yumpus 'x)]]. 11- [[prop:rompus]] are [[prop:floral]]. [[axiom:(rompus 'x) -> (floral 'x)]]. 12- [[prop:wumpus]] are [[prop:vumpus]].
